about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages cannot be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All ships in bundles are supplied fully assembled. Refitting is possible for in-game currency.

This bundle includes
  • Rank 8 Empire destroyer “Invincible”

Unique destroyer weapon
  • Meson cannon
  • Special weapons for suppressor destroyers:
  • Multiphase shield
  • “Tempest” launcher
  • Blaster turret
  • Pyro emitter

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 7 days!

The Invincible line of ships was created during the second war for the Bartle sector and has been constantly improved since then. True “workhorses” of the Imperial Spacefleet were used everywhere for fire support in offensive operations. Military doctrines changed, the fleet was updated, but Invincible always remained in the ranks. In many years of production and operation, more than forty different models and countless modifications of the destroyer were created. The latest model of Invincible is deservedly considered the strongest link in the modern fleet of the Empire.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages cannot be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All ships in bundles are supplied fully assembled. Refitting is possible for in-game currency.

This bundle includes

Unique destroyer weapon
  • Meson cannon
  • Special weapons for suppressor destroyers:
  • Multiphase shield
  • “Tempest” launcher
  • Blaster turret
  • Pyro emitter

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 7 days!

The Invincible line of ships was created during the second war for the Bartle sector and has been constantly improved since then. True “workhorses” of the Imperial Spacefleet were used everywhere for fire support in offensive operations. Military doctrines changed, the fleet was updated, but Invincible always remained in the ranks. In many years of production and operation, more than forty different models and countless modifications of the destroyer were created. The latest model of Invincible is deservedly considered the strongest link in the modern fleet of the Empire.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern Ubuntu distributions 13.04 or higher, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel HD 3000, HD 4000
  • Hard Drive: 8.5 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Drive: 8.5 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
